question: If you don’t see a heath check for an Application Load Balancer in the CloudWatch console after updating the health check’s port, what could be the reason?

answers.A: You must look for the health checks in the Application Load Balancer’s console.
answers.B: You failed to restart the Application Load Balancer after making the port change.
answers.C: You haven’t enabled your security group’s rules to ensure that they allow traffic to the new port.
answers.D: You can’t change a health check’s port.
